details.access_and_opening_times:
Opening Hours

GMT

Monday to Thursday: 5:30 am to 10 am/11 am to 2 pm and Friday: 5:30 am to 10 am

Local Time:

Monday to Thursday: 08:30 am to 1 pm/2 pm to 5 pm and Friday: 08:30 am to 1 pm

Consular Section:

For Personal Enquiries

Monday to Thursday: 08:45 am to 12:45 pm and Fridays: Closed

For Telephone Enquiries

Monday to Thursday: 08:30 am to 04:30 pm and Friday: 08:30 am to 12:30 pm

The Consular Section is closed on weekends and High Commission holidays.

In case of an emergency outside of office hours, please call +256 (0) 312 312000 for assistance.

Please note that our outside of office hours service is only for use by British nationals in an emergency situation.

Public Holidays

Date Holiday
New Year’s Day Thursday 01 January
Good Friday Friday 3 April
Easter Monday Monday 6 April (UK/Uganda)
Labour Day Friday 1 May (Uganda)
Privilege Holiday Queen’s Birthday Friday 22 May (UK)
Spring Bank Holiday Monday 25 May (UK)
Uganda Martyrs’ Day Wednesday 3 June (Uganda)
Heroes’ Day Tuesday 9 June (Uganda)
Eid-el-Fitr* Friday 17 July (Uganda)
Summer Bank Holiday Monday 31 August (UK)
Eid-al-Aduha* Wednesday 23 September (Uganda)
Independence Day Friday 9 October (Uganda)
Christmas Day Friday 25 December (UK/Uganda)
Boxing Day(Christmas Privilege Holiday) Monday 28 December (UK/Uganda)

*Take note that for 2015, the Eid holidays have been fixed in order to minimise the uncertainty caused by the late confirmation of the date on which the holiday falls.

Disabled Access

If you need to visit us or use our services and feel that they may be inaccessible to you, please call us at 0312-312-000 to make arrangements for access.

Depending upon mobility, access through the Consular and Visa entrance may not be possible, but an alternative is available on arrangement.
